channel.title: plans on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in plans on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-01
item.description: Elon Musk tells SpaceX employees that Starship engine crisis is creating a ‘risk of bankruptcy’ (3 minute read) SpaceX could face bankruptcy if it cannot achieve a Starship flight rate of at least once every two weeks next year.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-21
item.description: Google’s foldable phone plans include two devices, Android 12.1 release (4 minute read) Google is rumored to be working on two foldable phones and incorporating foldable functionality into an out-of-cycle update to Android.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-14
item.description: Zoom is adding live translation services and coming to Facebook VR (2 minute read) Zoom plans to add real-time transcription for up to 30 languages and real-time translation across as many as 12 languages by the end of next year.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-26
item.description: OnlyFans says it will no longer ban porn in stunning U-turn after user backlash (1 minute read) OnlyFans has suspended its plans to ban pornography.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-25
item.description: Airbnb says it plans to temporarily house 20,000 Afghan refugees (2 minute read) Airbnb will house 20,000 Afghan refugees around the world in the properties listed on its platform.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-15
item.description: Amazon bought Facebook’s satellite team to help build its Starlink competitor (3 minute read) Amazon has purchased Facebook’s small-satellite division.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-10
item.description: Facebook plans first smartwatch for next summer with two cameras, heart rate monitor (3 minute read) Facebook’s smartwatch will feature two cameras on a detachable display.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-06
item.description: Yahoo Answers will be shut down forever on May 4th (3 minute read) Yahoo Answers will shut down on May 4.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-09
item.description: Tesla buys $1.5 billion in bitcoin, plans to accept it as payment (2 minute read) Tesla announced that it bought $1.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-04
item.description: Warner Bros. will release all of its new 2021 movies simultaneously on HBO Max (5 minute read) Warner Bros.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-02
item.description: Facebook is opening its experimental predictions app to all users (1 minute read) Forecast, Facebook’s community for crowdsourced predictions and collective insights, is now available for people in the US and Canada to participate in.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-29
item.description: Apple vs. Epic hearing previews a long, hard-fought trial to come (3 minute read) Epic’s request for a temporary injunction in its case against Apple was heard recently.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-18
item.description: Apple Threatens to Terminate Epic Games’ Developer Accounts on August 28 (3 minute read) Apple plans to terminate Epic Games’ access to its App Store and app development tools by August 28.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-12
item.description: Airbnb plans to confidentially file for IPO this month (1 minute read) Airbnb is planning to submit a confidential filing with the SEC to go public this month, with shares trading by the end of the year.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-11
item.description: SpaceX reveals plans for a Texas spaceport resort in new job ad (2 minute read) SpaceX has posted a job for a ‘Resort Development Manager’ to be based out of Brownsville, a town near its Boca Chica test and development site.
